title: WireOne: Wire Funds Transfer Request Form
description: Worked with a team on a year long project to automate our Wire Funds form entry which would touch multiple deparments. I worked on responsive design, form capturing, after hour request processing, and backend queue processing.

title: Hann Financial Website
description: Site allows customers to securely view their loans and leases, make schedualed payments on their accounts, enroll in auto-pay, change contact information, and request payoff quotes. It also allows dealers to quote rates, submit loan applications, and request payoff quotes.

title: Valley Forge Asset Managment, LLC Website
description: Created a simple customer facing brochuire site for Valley forge Asset Manangment. Site was responsive with a database driven customer list.
